typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExcelDS
ExcelDS derive(WriteDate = currentDate(),
		column2 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedDataSet
DerivedDataSet sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DSsink
